main event: UFO sighting reported over Kisarazu, Japan, on April 6, 1955, involving a Japanese Air Force aircraft.
interesting points: The UFO was egg-shaped with a tail, measuring approximately 2 feet in diameter and 3 to 4 feet in length., The object emitted red, yellow-brown, and blue-white colors., The incident resulted in the canopy of the Japanese aircraft shattering, but the pilot was safe., The UFO passed within 200 feet of the Japanese aircraft during a training flight., The duration of the sighting was around 6-5-6 seconds.
sighted object: an egg-shaped UFO with a tail
